message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value related to the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the financial statements, I can find depreciation information in two places:

1. In the balance sheet: "Accumulated Depreciation" with an end amount of 91503.27
2. In the income statement: "Depreciation" with an amount of 91503.27
3. In the cash flow statement: "Depreciation" with an amount of 91503.27

The depreciation expense for the period is what represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of the asset over its useful life. This is shown in the income statement as 91503.27.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91503.27'} }
```
